documentation.summary: Initializes the provider.
documentation.param: The friendly name of the provider.
A collection of the name/value pairs representing the provider-specific attributes specified in the configuration for this provider.
documentation.exception: The name of the provider is null.
The name of the provider has a length of zero.
An attempt is made to call on a provider after the provider has already been initialized.

method.declaration: protected override void RegisterDependencies(HttpContextBase http, string js, string css)

documentation.summary: Registers the dependencies in the body of default.aspx
documentation.remarks: For some reason ampersands that aren't html escaped are not compliant to HTML standards when they exist in 'link' or 'script' tags in URLs, we need to replace the ampersands with & . This is only required for this one w3c compliancy, the URL itself is a valid URL.
